alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 14 at 3:21PM CST until December 14 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Mississippi, including the following county, Wayne. * WHEN...Until 630 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 320 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Whistler, Eucutta, Lightsey, Strengthford and Hiwannee.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
